QuestData.Title: Borrow Bastia
QuestData.Description: Head back down to the coast and tell Kilag that I'd like for you to borrow Bastia. The panther knows the way to where your friends are being held captive.$B$BGo now. I will see you again before we make our move against the Trade Prince.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Kilag Gorefang at the Tranquil Coast on the Lost Isles.
QuestData.RewardText: Of course you can borrow Bastia. That is, if she'll take you.$B$B<Kilag winks.>
